# Wingbind, Deadly (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[4th Level Witch Spells|Witch 4]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F/DF

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Target:** One winged creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Dragons (Mongoose Publishing), pg. 193

This specialised version of *[[Hold Monster (Spell)|hold monster]]* paralyses only the wings of a flying creature, causing it to fall. The creature suffers a â€“2 circumstance penalty to its Will saving throw against this spell.

*Arcane focus:* A pin.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Name changed from *wingbind* to *deadly wingbind* to avoid duplication.

*House Rule:* Level changed from Bard 3, Cleric 3, Sorcerer 4, Wizard 4 to Bard 4, Cleric 4, Sorcerer 5, Wizard 5 for game balance.

*House Rule:* Added Witch 4 to Level.
